name: Special Relativity Sandbox
description:
Special Relativity Sandbox is a physics sandbox application, which aims at being a great educational tool for explaining Einstein's Theory of Special Relativity.

Explore endless thought experiments through the power of an interactive Space-Time diagram, which lets you easily visualize all the effects that the Lorentz Transform have on space and time, using a user-friendly graphical style.

No maths involved! One of the core vision for this this app is to allow even the less mathematically inclined to gain a deep intuition on the notoriously complex topic of Einstein's Special Relativity. This is achievable with the high degree of visual interaction that the application offers.

Special Relativity Sandbox is also being submitted as an entry for 3Blue1Brown Summer of Mathematical Exposition edition #2. Thanks to the organizers of SuME2, this contest was a great motivational help!

Joint the discord server to report Bugs and leave Feedback!

Documentation on how to use is found within the app itself.
